name: WGLRLocalNews
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Listen to daily updates from WGLR. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime. For more on these stories, visit www.wglr.com
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
